summary.span: 表示不可选的 ，它呈现文本和图像并且可以显示超链接。

span.span: Represents a nonselectable that renders text and images and can display hyperlinks.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用类，以创建一个标签，可以呈现文本和图像，可以实现和属性。Use the class to create a label that can render text and images that can implement the and properties. 还具有许多属性，使其可以显示一个或多个超链接，并修改的外观和行为的超链接的其他属性。The also has many properties that enable it to display one or more hyperlinks, and other properties that modify the appearance and behavior of hyperlinks. 类似于，默认情况下不获得焦点并不会呈现为推送或突出显示。The is like a that does not get focus by default and that does not render as pushed or highlighted. 作为托管项支持访问密钥。 as a hosted item supports access keys. 使用， ，并上的属性若要支持中的链接控制。Use the , , and properties on a to support link control in a . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化包含一个链接通过设置， ， ， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a to contain a link by setting the , , , , and properties. MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Drawing::Color ActiveLinkColor { System::Drawing::Color get(); void set(System::Drawing::Color value); };
member this.ActiveLinkColor : System.Drawing.Color with get, set

summary.span: 获取或设置用来显示活动链接的颜色。

span.span: Gets or sets the color used to display an active link.

value.span: ，表示用来显示活动链接的颜色。

span.span: A that represents the color to display an active link.
The default color is specified by the system.
Typically, this color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 活动链接是正在被单击的链接。An active link is a link that is in the process of being clicked. 它类似于按下状态的控件。This is similar to the depressed state of a control. 此属性可用于指定该链接显示在过程中所单击的链接时的颜色。You can use this property to specify the color that the link is displayed in when the link is in the process of being clicked. 有若干种与链接相关联的颜色。There are a number of colors associated with a link. 指定在显示的所有链接的颜色控件。The specifies the color of all links displayed in the control. 属性可用于指定链接的颜色后用户访问。The property enables you to specify the color of a link after it has been visited by the user. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性时，请确保颜色设置要与该控件的背景的颜色不冲突的属性或不正确显示文本。When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly. 例如，如果该控件的背景色`Color.Red`和此属性设置为`Color.Red`，是不能正确显示文本时该链接是所单击的过程中。For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is in the process of being clicked. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化包含一个链接通过设置， ， ， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a to contain a link by setting the , , , , and properties. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel/VB/form1.vb#1)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个表示链接的行为的值。

span.span: Gets or sets a value that represents the behavior of a link.
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以指定控件中显示时的链接行为。This property enables you to specify the behavior of links when they are displayed in the control. 例如，如果你想在鼠标指针位于链接上时才会显示带下划线的链接，您可以将此属性设置为`LinkBehavior.HoverUnderline`。For example, if you want links to be displayed with an underline only when the mouse pointer is over a link, you can set this property to `LinkBehavior.HoverUnderline`. 有关可以与链接相关联的行为的类型的详细信息，请参阅。For more information about the types of behaviors that can be associated with a link, see . ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化包含一个链接通过设置， ， ， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a to contain a link by setting the , , , , and properties. summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示链接是否应显示为如同被访问过的链接。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether a link should be displayed as though it were visited.

value.span: 如果链接应显示为如同被访问过，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if links should display as though they were visited; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一个控件不自动代表一个链接是访问过的链接。A control does not automatically denote that a link is a visited link. 若要将链接显示为访问过的链接，可以设置此属性设置为值`true`中的单击事件的事件处理程序。To display the link as a visited link, you can set the value of this property to `true` in an event handler for the click event of the . 使用中指定的颜色显示访问过的链接属性的控件。A visited link is displayed using the color specified in the property of the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化包含一个链接通过设置， ， ， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a to contain a link by setting the , , , , and properties. summary.span: 引发 事件。

span.span: Raises the event.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

span.para: 重写时在派生类中，请务必调用基类的方法，以便已注册的委托接收事件。
When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

MemberSignature.Value: protected internal override bool ProcessMnemonic (char charCode);
.method familyorassemblyhidebysig virtual instance bool ProcessMnemonic(char charCode) cil managed
Protected Friend Overrides Function ProcessMnemonic (charCode As Char) As Boolean
protected public: override bool ProcessMnemonic(char charCode);

param.name: charCode
param.span: 要处理的字符。

span.span: The character to process.

summary.span: 处理助记键字符。

span.span: Processes a mnemonic character.

returns.span: 如果字符由控件作为助记键处理，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the character was processed as a mnemonic by the control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调用此方法以便为项提供机会处理助记键字符。This method is called to give an item the opportunity to process a mnemonic character. 该方法应确定是否该项处于处理助记键的状态，是否给定的字符是否表示助记键。The method should determine whether the item is in a state to process mnemonics and if whether the given character represents a mnemonic. 如果通过因此，此方法应执行与助记键并返回关联的操作`true`。If so, the method should perform the action associated with the mnemonic and return `true`. 如果不是，该方法应返回`false`。If not, the method should return `false`. 实现依赖于主机控件以调用方法，以确定给定的字符是否匹配项的文本中的助记键。The implementation relies on the host control to call the method to determine whether the given character matches a mnemonic in the item's text. 该方法在这种情况下，选择与标签关联的项或引发事件，如果不能选择该项。In this case, the method selects the item associated with the label, or raises the event if the item cannot be selected.

permission.span: 有关继承的类来调用此方法的所有窗口。

span.span: for all windows for inheriting classes to call this method.
Associated enumeration: value of .

span.span: A that represents the color used to display links that have been visited.
The default color is specified by the system.
Typically, this color is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性可以指定为中的所有链接显示的颜色中具有已访问过的用户。This property enables you to specify the color that is displayed for all links in the that have been visited by the user. > [!NOTE] > 设置此属性时，请确保颜色设置要与该控件的背景的颜色不冲突的属性或不正确显示文本。When setting this property, ensure that the color you are setting the property to does not conflict with the color of the control's background or the text does not display properly. 例如，如果该控件的背景色`Color.Red`和此属性设置为`Color.Red`，是不能正确显示文本时该链接显示为访问过的链接。For example, if the background color of the control is `Color.Red` and this property is set to `Color.Red`, the text is not shown properly when the link is displayed as a visited link. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何初始化包含一个链接通过设置， ， ， ，和属性。The following code example demonstrates how to initialize a to contain a link by setting the , , , , and properties. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel/CS/form1.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ToolStripLabel/VB/form1.vb#1)]
